clues.text: More than 30% of its approximately 105,000 residents are students at the University of Colorado
To scoop water out of a boat, or to leave suddenly to avoid a bad situation
Sets of these to elevate you & raise your heart rate include L.A.'s Prospect ones & D.C.'s Exorcist ones
In 1961 an airplane looking for bugs in the atmosphere found one of these wood eaters flying at 19,000 feet
"They're not saints" was a tagline for this 2011 show with Minka Kelly as one of the title trio; Jaclyn Smith was heavenly in 1976
First name of Koufax or Duncan + a frozen waffle brand once owned by Kellogg's = this not quite a Southern California city
"There's no place like" this Alaskan Gold Rush town located on the southern coast of the Seward Peninsula
To follow stealthily during a hunt, or the main stem of a plant
Get fit with this fighting sport whose name indicates it uses hands & feet; MMA adds other moves like grappling
These 2 elements make up more than 90% of the air you breathe
Nicollette Sheridan & Elaine Hendrix both played Alexis in 2019 on this nighttime soap, but Joan Collins was enough in 1981
1st name of the guy "who lives in a pineapple under the sea" + activity with "star promenade" & "arm turns" = this dude with new moves
Incorporated in 1961, this Florida city lives up to its name today around 7 a.m.
Extremely sensitive to the touch, or a smaller ship used to assist a larger one... any "Below Deck" fans playing now?
This company's star instructors for member workouts have included Kristin McGee for yoga & Cody Rigsby on the bike
These avians can rotate their wings to generate lift while flapping both up & down, enabling them to hover in the air
There was a time, 2013, whenChris Hardwickhosted "@midnight", but today, it'sthiscomedian who's on "After Midnight"
The state where you'll find Sleepy Hollow & New Paltz + shortened plural for a cloth used to blow the nose
Named for a city in France,thisstate capital lies along the Winooski River
A part of the body, or a pro wrestler who purposely antagonizes fans; c'mon, ref! How did you not see that?!
Seenmore often at senior swim than a Katie Ledecky workout, it does help work your obliques
Thesedelicate, high-level clouds are made entirely of ice crystals
In 2018 Juliet Higgins helped solve mysteries in Hawaii on this show, but back in 1980, it was Jonathan Higgins on the case
A word preceding "punishment" when that's applied to a body + married name of Ark. Gov. Sarah = this demoted fried chicken magnate
Take a load off in this third-largest Iowa city that hosts a famous jazz festival honoring native son Bix Beiderbecke
Prey, or an excavation to remove stone
As a model of the universe opposed to the Big Bang, it's in trouble; as a low-intensity type of cardio training, it's still popular
Look out! We're surrounded by this, the lowest layer of Earth's atmosphere
Whether it was Roselyn Sánchez in 2021 or Ricardo Montalbán in 1977, your "Fantasy Island" host had this last name
5-letter synonym for terrible that also describes the "Truth" in a film title + the Willis one in Illinois = this European eyesore
